column4: i got logged in but its at a command prompt. How can I tell it to start gnome?
sudo invoke-rc.d gdm start or to go strait to gnome without re-logging in just "startx" ( do not run startx as root! )
ok it says starting gnome display manager, but then nothing happens. If I do startx, then it says fatal server error: no screens found
What happened before you were thrown to a terminal?
